name: Bit.ly
description: Bitly is a URL shortening service. The company Bitly, Inc. was established in 2008. It is privately held and based in New York City. Bitly shortens 600 million links per month,[2] for use in social networking, SMS, and email. Bitly makes money by charging for access to aggregate data created as a result of many people using the shortened URLs.

apis.name: Bitly Link API
apis.description: Welcome to the bitly API! If you're looking to shorten links, bundle links, or retrieve link-level or user-level analytics programmatically, you've come to the right place.  The bitly API allows developers to shorten links, bundle links, or retrieve link-level or user-level analytics programmatically, you've come to the right place. Utilize bitly's new "bitmarking" functionality, save and edit links as bitmarks and pull in bitmarks from an authenticated user's social netwo
